definitions.definition: To attempt to seize something suddenly.
To take or seize hastily, abruptly, or without permission or ceremony.

definitions.example: Someone has just snatched my purse!

definitions.definition: (by extension) To take (a victory) at the last moment.
To do something quickly in the limited time available.
definitions.example: He snatched a glimpse of her while her mother had her back turned.

definitions.definition: The act by which something is snatched.
definitions.example: Three purse snatchings in the park were reported this week.
